<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Prevent redundant register copies due to reads and writes of physical</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// registers. The original motivation for this was the code generated</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// between two calls, which are caused both the return value and the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// argument for the next call being in %r0.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Example:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   1: &lt;call1&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   2: %vreg = COPY %r0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   3: &lt;use of %vreg&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   4: %r0 = ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   5: &lt;call2&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The scheduler would often swap 3 and 4, so an additional register is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// needed. This code inserts a Barrier dependence between 3 &amp; 4 to prevent</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The code below checks for all the physical registers, not just R0/D0/V0.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#a66da5b549929dc8bddf8caf40e4376d2">SchedRetvalOptimization</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;HII = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagoninstrinfo">HexagonInstrInfo</a>&amp;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(&#42;DAG-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scheduledag/#a348590624c488b04d0f9e227e6c3960e">TII</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Create artificial edges between loads that could likely cause a bank</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// conflict. Since such loads would normally not have any dependency</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// between them, we cannot rely on existing edges.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0, e = DAG-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scheduledag/#a3d5aacd5fc7d6a739ce913974ed1e53d">SUnits</a>.size(); i != e; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Is the access size is longer than the L1 cache line, skip the check.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BaseOp0 == </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> || !BaseOp0-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a4c9594c955fec80c73ddd964b5efd554">isReg</a>() || !Size0.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/locationsize/#a0b0401973fc9567440717a5d32a8eb8d">hasValue</a>() ||</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Scan only up to 32 instructions ahead (to avoid n^2 complexity).</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Change the latency between the two SUnits.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="618"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// If the SUnit has a zero latency edge, return the other SUnit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="619" lineLink="#abdd044c0a8482db135c0470df8d1920b"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;<a href="#abdd044c0a8482db135c0470df8d1920b">getZeroLatency</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;SDep, 4&gt;</a> &amp;Deps) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="620"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> : Deps)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="621"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.isAssignedRegDep() &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.getLatency() == 0 &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="622"><span class="doxyHighlight">        !<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.getSUnit()-&gt;getInstr()-&gt;isPseudo())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="623"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.getSUnit();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="624"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="625"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="626"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="627"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Return true if these are the best two instructions to schedule</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="628"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// together with a zero latency. Only one dependence should have a zero</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="629"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// latency. If there are multiple choices, choose the best, and change</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="630"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the others, if needed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="631"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HexagonSubtarget::isBestZeroLatency(SUnit &#42;Src, SUnit &#42;Dst,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="632"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HexagonInstrInfo &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>, SmallSet&lt;SUnit&#42;, 4&gt; &amp;ExclSrc,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="633"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SmallSet&lt;SUnit&#42;, 4&gt; &amp;ExclDst)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="634"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MachineInstr &amp;SrcInst = &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>-&gt;getInstr();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="635"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MachineInstr &amp;DstInst = &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a>-&gt;getInstr();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="636"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="637"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ignore Boundary SU nodes as these have null instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="638"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a>-&gt;isBoundaryNode())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="639"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="640"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="641"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SrcInst.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#ad43bf1af480830a4d6604e969e3f38e9">isPHI</a>() || DstInst.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#ad43bf1af480830a4d6604e969e3f38e9">isPHI</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="642"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="643"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="644"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagoninstrinfo/#ad4475ef8d36797ed68e422e259b7b4cf">isToBeScheduledASAP</a>(SrcInst, DstInst) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="645"><span class="doxyHighlight">      !<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagoninstrinfo/#a4ab4c0bfcb70883e983a325153b5a44e">canExecuteInBundle</a>(SrcInst, DstInst))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="646"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="647"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="648"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The architecture doesn&#39;t allow three dependent instructions in the same</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="649"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// packet. So, if the destination has a zero latency successor, then it&#39;s</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="650"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// not a candidate for a zero latency predecessor.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="651"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#abdd044c0a8482db135c0470df8d1920b">getZeroLatency</a>(Dst, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a>-&gt;Succs) != </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="652"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="653"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="654"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if the Dst instruction is the best candidate first.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="655"><span class="doxyHighlight">  SUnit &#42;Best = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="656"><span class="doxyHighlight">  SUnit &#42;DstBest = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="657"><span class="doxyHighlight">  SUnit &#42;SrcBest = <a href="#abdd044c0a8482db135c0470df8d1920b">getZeroLatency</a>(Dst, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a>-&gt;Preds);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="658"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SrcBest == </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> || <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>-&gt;NodeNum &gt;= SrcBest-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit/#a3f708b119627541f144d703a1d183202">NodeNum</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="659"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check that Src doesn&#39;t have a better candidate.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="660"><span class="doxyHighlight">    DstBest = <a href="#abdd044c0a8482db135c0470df8d1920b">getZeroLatency</a>(Src, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>-&gt;Succs);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="661"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DstBest == </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> || <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a>-&gt;NodeNum &lt;= DstBest-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit/#a3f708b119627541f144d703a1d183202">NodeNum</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="662"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Best = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="663"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="664"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Best != Dst)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="665"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="666"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="667"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The caller frequently adds the same dependence twice. If so, then</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="668"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// return true for this case too.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="669"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((Src == SrcBest &amp;&amp; Dst == DstBest ) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="670"><span class="doxyHighlight">      (SrcBest == </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;&amp; Dst == DstBest) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="671"><span class="doxyHighlight">      (Src == SrcBest &amp;&amp; Dst == </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="672"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="673"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="674"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Reassign the latency for the previous bests, which requires setting</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="675"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the dependence edge in both directions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="676"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SrcBest != </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="677"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagonsubtarget/#ab330d9a1d4b705737ae86e52903d09b1">hasV60Ops</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="678"><span class="doxyHighlight">      changeLatency(SrcBest, Dst, 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="679"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="680"><span class="doxyHighlight">      restoreLatency(SrcBest, Dst);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="681"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="682"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DstBest != </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="683"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagonsubtarget/#ab330d9a1d4b705737ae86e52903d09b1">hasV60Ops</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="684"><span class="doxyHighlight">      changeLatency(Src, DstBest, 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="685"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="686"><span class="doxyHighlight">      restoreLatency(Src, DstBest);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="687"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="688"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="689"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Attempt to find another opprotunity for zero latency in a different</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="690"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// dependence.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="691"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SrcBest &amp;&amp; DstBest)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="692"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If there is an edge from SrcBest to DstBst, then try to change that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="693"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to 0 now.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="694"><span class="doxyHighlight">    changeLatency(SrcBest, DstBest, 0);</span></CodeLine>
